docker-compose: echo 'Docker Compose comes bundled with Docker Desktop. Please install Docker Desktop.'

docker: curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list >/dev/null && sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin
docker-compose: curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg && echo 'deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list >/dev/null && sudo apt-get install -y docker-compose-plugin
